channel.title: jaiveer_talwar@giftsthatgive.in – UAECovid
channel.description: Covid 19 in the United Arab Emirates

item.title: Covid-19 Digital Pass for  Wallet
item.dc:creator: jaiveer_talwar@giftsthatgive.in
item.content:encoded:
A Digital Covid Vaccine Pass for  Wallet

Get Started

with Covid Vaccination Pass for  Wallet

You’ll need:

  • Alhosn app
  • an iPhone

Step 1: Open the Alhosn app. Login if you haven’t already. The app should open to the Expo 2020 Dubai Pass. Swipe to the right and press ‘add pass’. Next, press ‘Travel Pass – Vaccination’.

Step 2: Open pass.uaecovid.com. Press ‘Next’ on the website you’ve been taken to. Agree and press ‘Scan QR Code’. Next, grant camera access and point the camera at the QR code in the Alhosn app.

Step 3: Press ‘Add to Apple Wallet’. You’re done!
